text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh dawmu ealaa ma 'antum ealayh min altasdiq aljazm biallah taealaa wabirasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, wamin taethma, wbalqran aldhy nazalah elyh, wbjmye alkutub alty anzlha allah ealaa alrsl. waman yakfur biallah teala, wamalayikatih almkrmyn, wakutubih alty anzlha lhdayt khlqh, warusulih aladhin astfahm ltblygh rsalth, walyawm alakhir aldhy yaqum alnaas fih baed mwthm lileard walhsab, faqad kharaj min aldyn, wbaeud bedana kbyrana ean tariq alhq
